comment._content: Charles Plunkett, involved in the Lexington Avenue Bombing in July 1914: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lexington_Avenue_bombing

comment._content:

comment._content: Thanks Wystan and pennylrichardsca for making the connections between these photos and for the information on Plunkett. We will add some of it to the description when we update.
